channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Butter Mochi
item.description: About Recipe copied from Hawaiian Electric’s page for posterity. Demonstrated by: Helen Kuoha-Torco. Aloha Festivals - August 16, 2003. Ingredients: 1 lb mochiko (Japanese glutinous rice flour) 3 cups sugar 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder 4 eggs, beaten 2 teaspoons vanilla extract 1/2 cup butter, melted 1 can (13.5 oz) coconut milk 1 can (14.5 oz) evaporated milk Directions: Preheat electric oven to 350Â°F. Grease a 13 x 9 x 2-inch pan or two 8 x 8 x 2-inch pans.

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: echo "Hello World!" Welcome to my blog and first ever blog post! Why I’m Blogging To share my knowledge, thoughts, and ideas with others. To get better at writing and expressing said thoughts and ideas. As a link hoarder, I want somewhere to dump my links (this will be in my Collections page). Learn Hugo, HTML/CSS, and maybe some JavaScript. Topics Command Line Tools. Things like vim, tmux, git, etc. Scripting.
